author: W. Mears
title: Great Casual Fun!
content: I'm a late jumper onto the Angry Birds bandwagon, having just downloaded my first game (Star Wars II) last week.  That opened the door to what's become a bit of an addiction.  Simply put, this game (and I suspect the entire series) is an easy one to pick up and play for a few minutes, but don't be surprised when those few minutes turn into hours!  The gameplay is simple to learn (I got 3 stars in almost every level of the first section and still surprise myself on some new levels) but challenging to master (some levels have proven difficult to get past 1 star).

author: DanT
title: Difficult and Lots of fun
content: This one is more difficult than the other Angry Birds.  You need to plan for several variables within each level as you go.  The effects of light sabers, using the force,  Storm Piggies and their guns etc!!!  Yes, you can pay for an upgrade in the game.  I wasn't super happy about that, but i did it, i really don't think 5 dollars total (game and upgrade) is an outlandish expense for a few hours of fun.  After completing it I always go back and try to get 3 stars on every level.  I rarely buy games, but when I do, I do it to enjoy them, not to race through see how fast I can finish and then be done with it.  This is an enjoyable game, with varying levels of difficulty within the game.  4 stars only because I thought there were going to be more levels.  Although it does not say there is, I was hoping for a level (scenario) for every movie.

I purchased this for a friends little boy for 2.99 to play while he was here and when I recieved the confirmation of my order there was a charge of 2.99 and a second charge for 9.99 for "Mighty Falcon Large Bundle" product.  When I contacted  Amazon I was told there must have been a new level activated or a new charactor introduced.  The Amazon customer service rep was kind enough to remove the charge this one time but if it happened in the future I would know the reason for reason and it would not be able to be removed.

author: jefwith1fjef
title: STOP THE WHINING
content: I cant believe how many people complain about having to buy an app. The same people who whine about spending. $2.99 for a game that may bring hours of enjoyment, think nothing about spending 4$ on a cup of overrated coffee every morning. And in regards to the people who b#@%* and moan about in app purchases, it says clearly in the description that there are in app purchases if you choose to buy them, so if you are feeling "ripped off " you have only yourself to blame for not reading the description.  As for the game itself, I like the STAR WARS theme and the different attributes given each bird, based on powers the star war movie characters had. I just wished it had more land based boards and less outerspace type of locales, but still a solid 4 stars.

author: Crow
title: Great game, but dislike the marketing ploy
content: I had pretty much lost interest in Angry Birds games through Seasons and Rio and still haven't completed Space, but when I played a couple of rounds of Star Wars on a friend's device, I decided to get it. I am enjoying it as much as the original Angry Birds, but for the rude marketing ploys for people who want to buy their way in to a new level. As far as I can tell, you can achieve three stars on any level without an additional purchase, but the whole idea of tendering bribe money to the manufacturer to get there faster and with less work disgusts me. Come on, people! This is a game. It's meant to entertain you, and although it may take a while to get there, your feeling of accomplishment will be much greater if you don't "cheat" by buying your way to fame. Put aside your desires for instant gratification and take the game for what it is: a pastime. FYI, the roots of that word are "pass" and "time." Give that a bit of thought before you buy a "cheat."

author: starwarsfan
title: The best Angry Birds since, well, Angry Birds.
content: First off, let me say that I am not a hardcore mobile gamer, but I love me some Angry Birds. The first AB was simply amazing. But every other AB, excluding Space, used the same gameplay formula. It got a little repetitive. I guess the old addage held true: If it ain't broke, don't fix it. AB Space was the first to break the formula. And it was amazing. Let me just say, AB Star Wars is as ground breaking as it is fun. It mixes the gameplay of the original AB with that of AB Space. It a perfect balance of both. And the birds each have their own abilities. I won't go into that much detail about it though, you'll have to play it to see. And they used the Star Wars license perfectly. It tells (in a roundabout way) the story of Episode IV A New Hope, with Hoth coming soon, and includes the Path of the Jedi DLC. While I agree that $2.99 is a little steep in price, I must say that it is definitely worth it, especially to fans of past AB games and to Star Wars fans. Rovio has outdone themselves with this one.

author: J. Thomason
title: If you loved the original Angry Birds and are a nerd - this game is for you!
content: Angry Bird took the planet by storm with its macabre sense of justice against the evil egg stealing pig - you move from level to level (to level) of high flying bird destruction to win victory!  Essentially each level is a different puzzle of sorts where you need to aim, fire, and sometimes use a particular bird's special power to kill all pigs and destroy as much scenery as possible to rack up the points.  In the Star Wars version you pretty much do the exact same thing but with all the off-world, outter rim action (and music and campy birds at a Star Wars convention) you can handle.  I might be lame but at least I always know where my Kindle Fire is - and let me tell you - playing on a nice big Kindle screen vs. small smartphone makes a HUGE difference.  If you don't own one, consider purchasing one.

author: Retinen
title: Wasn't expecting this
content: I have to start off by saying I am a fan of both franchises, but I have to admit I wasn't expecting this to be so good. I was horrified when I heard they were coming out with Angry Birds Star Wars. I thought it would be an abomination. I was so wrong. The implementation of Star Wars type characters into the game is flawless. The levels are smartly designed and call for quite a bit of thinking to get the best score possible and the different types of birds are genius. I highly recommend this to anyone who has liked previous iterations of Angry Birds and even suggest you try this one out if you are just a big Star Wars fan who has never tried these games.

There is one problem though, after paying 2.99 for the first 2 worlds u have to pay another 1.99 if u want the path of the Jeri package. That's a total rip off!!!!!  I could understand that in a free version ( which they don't offer for the kindle fire) but in the $3 version seriously ripping people off. author: JS
title: Annoyed at Rovio
content: The idea of a Star Wars Angry Birds game is fun, and the game moves along similarly to other Angry Birds games (though with some added fun of using the force, a light sabre, and a blaster, just to name a few) through Tatooine and the Death Star levels.  However, the $1.99 upgrade you have to purchase to move on to the third level "Path of the Jedi" is lame.  It would have been better to require the purchase of additional content beyond what was initially furnished with the game; however, the Path of the Jedi level is there for all to see immediately after you purchase the initial game, and you are not told you have to spend the additional 2 bucks until you get to it.  Either charge the full $6.98 up front, or be up front about the $1.99 upgrade - the way they've done it is a little underhanded.

author: Proud Grammy
title: Not what I had hoped for or expected
content: This is my fourth version of Angry Birds and I am quite disappointed with it.  The graphics are good, but the birds' powers are not.  I am fairly adept with the other versions of this game and enjoy the challenge of figuring out the necessary angles and trajectories needed to win the levels.  In this version it is extremely difficult to over come the handicap of weak bird powers and the inability to actually be able to aim the birds.  However, my 10 year old grandson, who is a whiz at the Angry Birds games, and also struggles with the version, is enough of a Star Wars fan to still enjoy it; thus the 3 star rating.  For my personal rating of enjoyment and playability I would not give it more than about a one and a half.  I am glad it was on sale for .99 when I bought it as I feel it is not worth the usual $2.99 price.

content: Loved the game until I got to the return of the Jedi level. So you have 2 options to continue playing. Go back and get 3 stars on every single level or pay $1.99. Really? I mean really? I'm not that hardcore that 2 stars is not good enough for me. Heck some levels get all the pigs in one bird and it gives you 1 star, is that the trap? I paid $2.99 for what I assumed was a full version. I'd give that 1 star if I didn't enjoy the game thus far. Buyer beware. It's a bait and switch.

author: A. Romney
title: Super fun...but I'm confused
content: This is the best Angry Birds yet!  it combines regular play with Angry Birds in Space with Star Wars. What could be better?

author: Michael
title: THE BEST ANGRY BIRD YET
content: I'm sure I've reviewed this one before, but I'm going to do it again because I LOVE THIS GAME..the first, second, and third ANGRY BIRD games kept getting better and better, but this STAR WARS ANGRY BIRD really pops! The difference I think is the difficulty in obtaining higher levels. Where gravity was always a factor in trajectories, now WEIGHTLESSNESS  and ORBITS is just as big a problem. BIRDS IN SPACE  started that but add the forever endearing STAR WARS theme and, it becomes really interesting...and remaking the birds into SW characters is soooo hilarious! But don't let the cute fool you. The levels become very difficult as you advance...I think I reviewed STAR WARS ANGRY BIRD month's ago, and I STILL haven't beaten the game! I am an ANGRY BIRD fan all the way, but this one is honestly the best...and you get to kick Darth-Bird-Vader right in the....well, you know....enough said

author: Shawna L. Thornton
title: Great game
content: Great so far, just started playing. Love the Amazon one-click buy option. Love my Amazon Kindle Fire!!  I would definitely recommend.

author: Tyler
title: angry birds doesnt get much better!!
content: when I heard the title of this game, I thought it was impossible. merging two of the most popular things, dare I say it, ever? not possible! I was wrong. the angry birds series nae never been better, perfectly going along with the star wars story. the birds all have new powers, witch are all in glorious slow motion (matrix, anyone?). the only complaint I have is WHY didn't the series do this in the first place? final score: 10/10 stars epic game!!

author: Cory W.
title: New Birds game isn't as epic as the license it bears.
content: Usual Angy Birds affair with the introduction of space, gravity effects, blasters and lightsabers. The Space edition had a short shelf life for me and this Star Wars edition feels the same to me. I would pass on this if I was not a Star Wars fan. The Abracadabra AG Seasons has the better gameplay appeal with portals a more compelling draw for me than rehashed gravity fields from Space.

author: chilp
title: Great
content: Ok I have to admit it I'm hooked on these birds and pigs. It the only game I play constantly, its addicting good thing i like to read and do other things or I might not do anything else.

author: Dave R
title: I feel ripped off
content: At the 3rd level it tells you that you have to pay more money unless you have 3 stars at all levels.  I went and got 3 stars at all levels, there is some hidden level that won't let me advance.  I wouldn't recommend the game because of this.

author: tantulas
title: where?
content: So the second update for cloud city is already out for my phone but not for my kindle, it's been out for a couple of days now so where is it on my kindle? Is it just taking them longer on the kindle or what? They should just release it to all  the  os at the same time if that's the case.

author: LUCK
title: Like Other Angry Birds?  Then you'll like this.
content: If you've never played any Angry Birds, then you should get at least one version - and this one is as good of a place to start as any.  It's a very simple game to play that is easy to get into even if you only have a few minutes.  But it is challenging and engaging enough that it can keep you going for hours if you are so inclined.

author: So Little Time...

content: Had fun till I got to the one level to where I had to get the stars on each battle before the next level would open up or I could pay money to advance. Disappointed.

author: Justine

author: lenzor

content: TOTAL AWESOMENESS!!!!!!! AMAZING FUN FOR EVERYONE!!!!!!! MORE LEVELS MORE FUN!!!!! Only down side is that you have to pay for some levels.

author: D Winchester
title: I loved this game, but.....
content: I loved this game! It is funny, challenging, and a good time filler.  Unfortunately,  I come from a time when if you bought a game you got the whole game. I already paid for the game why should I shell out more money for the rest of it.  Shouldn't that be called,  " Angry Birds Star Wars 2?"  The way I am made to feel that I am missing something if I don't buy the end is wrong.  It is a bait and switch that just ticks me off.  I loved this game but could not give it 5 stars because some scammer wants to make a buck.

author: Stephanie Hyatt
title: Wow!
content: So awesome! I cannot put how awesome it is in words! If Rovio is reading this, make a version of Angry birds and mix EVERY game together, with a level editor mixing every bird and piece into the editor slots.

author: Noramary
title: Awesome

I bought the Kindle fire I bought the game again now I have to beat the game all over. So I bought it again, that's how much fun this game is and how much I love it.

author: B Hob

content: Order by mistake, but kept it to give it a try. It is a good game for a rainy day.

author: MauiCris
title: Go for this app!
content: This is by far the best Angry Birds app they've made. Much more fun and challenging, you have to overcome space drift, orbital pull and more. Different birds with different capabilities and seeing them as Star Wars characters is a lot of fun. Graphics are crisp and clean and the game is well-paced. Starts out so easy and then gets progressively more complex. After playing this, I doubt I will ever play the other Angry Birds again. HIGHLY recommend this app.

author: Kurtis R. Durkop
title: Fun game.
content: Fun game but can get a little tedious as you advance. Then becomes very difficult to play.

author: Wesley
title: Expires after 30 days of no network connectivity
content: App contains DRM that requires it to phone home every 30 days to stay active. If you don't connect to the internet in that period the app refuses to run until it internet connection is restored.

author: Stephanie
title: More of a challenge!!!
content: I LOVE Angry Birds.  I have found all the fruits/eggs and have 3 stars on all the other games.  Star Wars is a much bigger challenge.  But I still really like it.  If you like any of the Angry Birds you will like it even better with the Star Wars theme, so creative!!

author: r. laver

author: Billy Lackey

Different planets to travel to, a Death Star and more, you will find yourself immersed in Star Wars goodness!!

author: TnJen
title: Lots of fun!

author: awesome

Now all we need is Angry Birds Lord of the Rings with arrows,  swords, magic, and a Sauron piggy...

author: Tammy L. Barton

author: Ash Phan

content: It think this is the best angry birds game there is. I somehow cant update Cloud City though. Also, its always me who is angrier than the birds sometimes. Overall, it is a good game.

author: Timothy Sapp
title: Really fun game
content: I got it for my daughter and my wife also likes it. The free version was giving me problems and kept freezing up on me so I uninstalled it and got this version.It works fine for now at least. I guess the free version wets your appetite so you'll buy the program.

author: W. Marques
title: Mindless fun
content: This is an entertining, relatively mindless game to help pass time. My children (7,6,4) also enjoy playing it. Easy to use and levels to increase in difficulty as you progress through. I like it better than the regular Angry Bird games.

author: Michael
title: Best Angry Birds Edition EVER!
content: This is by far the best angry birds I have played.  From lightsaber action to jedi mind tricks.  Enjoy the background music of each episode, brings you back to the days when Star Wars fist came out.  I have this on my original Kindle Fire (HD 7-inch) and it works great.

author: Babs
title: More money, more money, more money!!
content: I LOVE Angry Birds.  I have always gotten the free games, until now.  I don't mind paying a few bucks for a game, but then I expect to have the WHOLE game, not just the first few levels.  To complete the game, I will have to pay for more levels.  Also, I got 5 nifty torpedo spaceships.  When I had used them up, I got a message that I could get more for $1.99!  The game has great graphics and is fun to play, but I don't recommend it.  The original, free game is just as much fun.

author: Nana
title: Evil laugh
content: Angrynbirds star wars is challenging!  I very much enjoy Darth Vader's evil laugh if you don't clear the level.  Looking forward to completing the series.

author: Katie

author: noah
title: Four Stars
content: it is pretty fun but gets boring once you complete it

author: Caroline
title: Addicting game! Kids love it too!!
content: I have loved Star Wars since seeing it back in the 70's.  This game is fun to play.  I had to stop playing the first time I tried it because my Kindle Fire battery needed to be charged.  I love how the characters are integrated into the Andry Birds world.  My favorite so far is that the Luke Angry Bird has lightsaber capabilities (after passing a certain level).  My kids (who have not seen the movies yet)  also love playing the game.  They are 6 and 4 making this fun for everyone.  My husband, who is not a huge fan of the movies enjoys the game too.

author: ok I like it

author: JAK in WDC
title: Best One EVER
content: OK,  yes, I am a huge Star Wars fan (the good ones, not the crappy ones)., but this version of Angry Birds is fantastic. First of all, you are dealing with gravity. You have planets and asteroids in space and you can use bank shots or use the object's gravity to get your bird where it needs to be.Second, the special powers of the birds are a big asset, although I still haven't gotten the hang of Obi Wan. Great fun.

author: jayholman
title: Big fun in a little game
content: Most are familiar with Angry Birds and their quest to vanquish evil piggies. This version dresses the familiar birds up in costumes that resemble Star Wars characters and scenery. That alone would be worth the price of the ad-free app, just to have new levels of Angry Birds, and the overall coolness of Star Wars. But there's more! This game introduces new physics to the familiar game by including levels that require you to send your birds in orbit around planets, or deal with the effects relative gravity. Extra fun for the same low price :)

author: Kayla Scott
title: I'm addicted.
content: This game is so fun.  The birds each have their own unique ability.  There is some strategy involved.  You have to think about the trajectory of the birds, how the gravity (the pulses of the gravity) effects their fall, but mostly it is just fun to pop the pigs or give them black eyes.  Some levels are just fun and others are really challenging.  It's a good game for anyone.  I recommend this game to everyone.

author: Amazon Customer
title: where are the updates?
content: great game, but the updates for the kindle fire take forever. New cloud levels have been out for weeks, but still waiting for amazon to update, I am so tired of waiting especially since I paid for this!

author: Joshua Triggs

I have never seen Star Wars so I don't know how true to the movie the outfits and weapons are but it is such a great game!!!

author: Mahri

author: Janice Forbes
title: Fun and addicting
content: The best thing about angry birds star wars is it's not just the same old birds. They have been given cool new powers, or weapons, and the boards are more challenging to match. My favorite bird is now Red, because he went from useless to cool with the addition of a lightsaber. I paid for it and don't have the free version on my kindle fire HD, so I am never bothered by ads whatsoever. So worth it. I have the free version on my phone and it's so annoying the way it literally interrupts the game!

author: annette szafranski
title: I feel very disappointed in angry bird star wars due to the fact that I wasn't told that I have to keep spending $ to play
content: I have to keep spending money if I want to keep playing.  It took less than 15 min. to reach the point where I would have to spend more money, for example, the third circle requires an additional 1.99 + tax. I feel this should have been made clear before the original purchase of $2.99 + tax.

author: kvasko
title: Good
content: Pretty good app, but I guess I'm just not that big of an Angry Birds fan, which is why I gave it a 3 star rating. I did like the Star Wars twist on it though. The levels are comical and fun especially if your a Star Wars fan, like I am. If you have liked the other Angry Bird games you would probably like this one.

author: JB Fletcher from Cabot Cove
title: Hoth is available?  Where on the Kindle?
content: I paid the $2.99 for Star Wars and now I have to pay for the Hoth update? I don't think so Rovio!

author: Kitty S.
title: fun game
content: Fun game, haven't made it all the way through, yet. I need ten more words to get out of this comment section.

author: c.klein
title: great
content: this is yet another great game from rovio includes lots of content.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Frustrated with customer service regarding the crashing Cloud levels.
content: So I contacted Rovio about the app crashing when I try to load the new Cloud levels.  They said it's an Amazon issue and they released the fixed version over 2 weeks ago.  So why haven't we received the updated version?  We are paying customers here.  As Kindle Fire owners we already pay more for our apps and wait longer than any other customers for updates.  I want my fixed update.  I don't think it's too much to ask for decent customer service when you pay for an item.  If Rovio sent the fixed update two weeks ago we should have had the update for two weeks....but no matter how many times I sync my Kindle Fire, update my apps, or restart my Kindle Fire I STILL have no fixed update.  Fix this or refund the money we paid for this app.

author: Luke "Clash" O.
title: Mistaken Reviews
content: There is a ridiculous amount of content in this game, any only one world is  locked until you pay. However, these levels can be unlocked for free by getting three stars in every level. If you are getting this game for a young child or you have a lot of trouble getting three stars, think of this game as costing $5 instead of $3. Also, there are probably even more levels coming in the future.

author: pieisnotpi
title: A fun spin on the franchise
content: Let me keep this short and basic. The game is a really fun take on angry birds. The birds have (most of them anyways)been transformed into the star wars characters you know and love. The HD is great. I'd say its the best looking game yet! The gameplay is vastly improved i'll try and maintain the surprise for you, but even the red bird (after a certain point) has an ability. Also (thanks amazon and/or rovio) the extra, more challenging. The game has some nice animations and, overall, it is a fantastic spin for both franchises. Thanks for reading! (okay ill admit it it wasn't exactly short and basic, but I got a little inspired, so I kept writing)

author: Saltiva
title: Sellouts with their Freemiums and ads, sickening.
content: Sellouts with their Freemiums and ads, sickening.

author: Michael D. Shaeffer
title: Love this game.
content: I was never a huge fan of the original Angry Birds. However, I'm a big Star Wars fan, so I decided to give this game a try. I'm glad I did. You could take out the Star Wars aesthetic and this would still be a great game.

author: Penny
title: Great-Grandson love this
content: I bought this when my greatgrandson saw it and wanted it. He is 8 years old and does very good at this game.  When I first got it he played with it for hours. I can't think of a better reason to buy this game then pleasing my great grandson and daughter she play it too when he lets her.

author: D. Boyden
title: changed settings on my kindle firr
content: nowhere in the description did it explain that this required downloading the android app store for access.  I gave my son permission to buy it and next thing I knew I had no amazon app store.  I had to reset to factory settings because it installed as a system setting.  rediculous.

author: Drivin
title: Best Angry Birds game yet
content: One of Rovio's best Angry Birds games yet.  The marrying of the two brands is carefully thought out and ends up creating a superior game as a result.  Haven't played the non-HD version for comparison but the visual are quite sharp on the Kindle Fire.

author: s. sugar
title: Challenging and Fun game
content: Fun, Fun, Fun!

author: APPC
title: need money to move on
content: This is ridiculous pay Three dollars for a game that shouldn't cost more than 99 cents; but then they have the nerve to make you pay three more dollars to move on I know that I will no longer be buying angry birds new games

author: dfjbchn
title: AWSUM
content: I love this game. I like evrything about this game. I didn't care that I paid for the third level. My only problem is that I Cant seem to get the hoth update on my kindle. :'(

author: patty
title: One Star
content: silly and boring after a short time.

author: Alex Armstrong
title: Not enough variety
content: There's not enough variety between games. It gets boring pretty quickly. Although the music is fun and keeps it more interesting. Without music, might be a 2 star.

author: Carmen Bahamonde
title: Son loves it!
content: My 5 yr old son loves this app.  There seems to be more functions that these birds do like have a light saber to fight those piggies.  The only negative is that after paying for the app, there are still some games that are locked and not sure if those are extra $ or they haven't been developed but that restriction frustrates my son.

author: PRESTON COX
title: This game changed my life
content: I was going nowhere....just kind of partying and strangling random hookers.  But this game shoved its life affirming wisdom down my philosophy hole with the deft hand of a trickster god on a strictnne bender.  I put down the bong and started reading books. Paper books with musty smells.  I saw that there was a thin veil in the world that few cold see and I pierced it with my mind penis.  I also started eating vegan and I look down on you. You poor ignorant fools.

author: K. Tuttle
title: Frustrated
content: I love Angry Birds, and I especially love the Star Wars edition, but I've experienced a lot of frustration with it over the last few days. When the Cloud City level updated awhile back, it would force close the app if I clicked on it. Since I'm usually passive, I left it alone. Then another recent update gave me the Moon of Endor level and I was thrilled, but Cloud City still had an issue. I contacted Amazon and somehow it got fixed without any further assistance on my part. I could access both without problem, and that made me one happy geek! Then another update popped up on my Kindle, and I okayed it without fear.

author: G. Doss
title: Updates
content: The one star is because even though we as Kindle users pay the most for the app, we are the slowest on getting updates.  I have been looking at this supposed Mayock update for MONTHS and still haven't gotten it.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Really???
content: Ok, I bought this because its Star Wars and Angry Birds put together. I am a fan of one, the other, not so much. Its enjoyable to see how they amalgamated the two worlds. What isn't fun is when they want you shell out an extra two bucks to play all of the levels. When I drop money for a game, I want the whole game. I know, its a strange concept, but apparently I'm not the only one thinking it.

author: Charles Schwab
title: Great Version
content: Difficult with lots of twist, fun. Great sound and HD gives it a realistic visual play. Br ready to never sleep again. May the force be with you. That was dumb to say.

author: Hope42013
title: Fun game
content: I have been having a good time (staying up half the night...) figuring out this new rendition of Angry Birds. I am a fairly new player to Angry Birds. I got my tablet for Christmas and the first thing I purchased was the original Angry Birds. I also bought the Bad Piggies, and I am not too crazy about that one. I will have to go back later and try it again. I'm glad it was relatively inexpensive just in case I decide to give up on it. May the force be with you!

author: Amazon Customer
title: May the force awake
content: This game is cool can u guys add a force awakens chapter pls

author: Jerri Freeman
title: CRAP OF A GAME !!!!!!
content: okay you get the game for three dollars which is a rip of  cause it just makes you spend MORE money in the game ,second it is SOOOOOO HARD!!! MARK MY WORDS DONT GET THIS CRAPY APP!!!!!!!!!!

author: M.Spencer
title: stupid
content: it is simply stupid because they want you to pay for the Jedi pack when you pay 3$ for the game and the ads are retarded to.... once again they want you to pay to take them off ........ I do not recommend this app to any one and I'm sorry for the people that feel the way I do :(

author: Jeannine
title: Need Help From Grand Children
content: This looks to be a very cute game! I was excited to get it because my older Grandchildren in their early 20's recommended it. Really felt good about taking their advice but then they had to come help me get started playing it. Still in a little dark about it but will get there! Lots of options and looks very exciting. Cute characters. She had a ball trying to help me out! She had no trouble putting it through it's paces. I'm not giving up on this one.

author: kathyanna74
title: Better than Angry Birds!
content: Each Star Wars bird has a special ability, a light saber, lazor gun, super strength, etc. Use these powers to conquer those nasty space pigs. If you fail a level, the evil laugh of Darth Pig will haunt you. It's great for all ages. At a basketball game, I saw an eight year old kid whizzing through the levels. The same levels I have struggled to complete. It gave me a new passion to beat that kid...I mean those pigs.

author: Travelsoftballdad
title: The BEST Angry Birds Game EVER !!
content: Hours of Fun !!  Five Stars !!  Angry Birds STAR WARS is a logical and well-done next step for fans of Angry Birds.  It is by far the BEST AB game for those who are even moderate fans of the movies.  Kindle version works great.  No issues at all.  My only wish would be for Rovio to send out the Kindle and other non-Apple versions same day as Apple versions.  I hate having to hear Apple owners talk about playing the new game that isn't available for me yet.

author: S. Lewis
title: it glitches
content: it glitches and i cant even play. its the most annoying thing cause i used to play and now i cant.

author: MamaD
title: fun fun fun
content: Lost a vacation to this addiction.....but it was fun!

author: awsome
title: BEST ANGRY BIRDS EVER .....
content: It is awesome the red bird is Luke,the black bird is obi won konobi, the yellow bird is han solo,the big brother is chewbacca,the white bird is C-3PO,the egg is R2-D2,the pink bird is princess lea,the mighty eagle is a mellenium falcon,and the king pig is darth vader.

author: Barb C
title: love,love, love it
content: it has re-kindled (pun intended) my love of the Angry Birds game.  My husband thinks I'm addicted.  I like to think of it as just a little obsessed.

author: Benjamin Schoenthal
title: Awesome Angry Birds
content: A great game of Angry birds especially for the Star Wars fan. Levels are challenging but fun. Game is easy enough for children but challenging for adults who are trying to get all the stars and bonuses. Unique birds with Star Wars based abilities gives the game a nice feel and differentiates it from previous titles

author: Darren M. Gentry
title: Helping the Economy $3 at a time
content: Angry Birds. Star Wars. Enough said... The game play is very similair to Angry Birds Space, so if you did not enjoy that one, then the same will hold true here. Just tryinng to add to the billions of $$$ made be Lucus corp. & the Angry Bird empire

author: Michelle
title: II death star update
content: I can't wait for the II death star update I still wonder why moon of endor only has 30 levels and all the rest have 40. It took a LONG time to finally 3 star all levels there are nine characters Luke, ben, han, rebels, chewbacca, C3-P0, R2-D2, leia, and lando. my favorite levels are the lord I mean lard vader boss's.

author: Mine co.
title: good but has some bugs with updates
content: I love it and I can't stop playing it but I really want the endor update BUT I can't get it

author: Shannon Fales
title: update issue
content: great game, but wheres my Hoth update? says its availible for my device and still nothing. should have check for updates either on device or in the store.

author: update
title: EXTREME AWSOME!!
content: when I first got this game I played it right away! The updates are awsome! The levels are awsome.I'm telling you to get the game.star wars and angry birds together awsome! You launch Darth Vader at the very last level!oops! I hope I'm not spoiling it for you but get the game!

author: Sky
title: great game!
content: This is the best Angrybirds yet! When you finish Tatoonie you unlock all the other worlds except path of the Jedi which is $1.99.

author: Tawna
title: Five Stars
content: Fun app

author: delaRoca
title: cool game
content: this is way better then regular angry birds and angry birds star wars is the best game ever because it has cool levels in the tattooine and the death star and the hoth and the jedi and the bonus levels and it has new powers

author: Shirley K
title: Fun Gets Harder
content: Being new to Angry Birds I find this a fun way to spend my time.  The game does get harder as I progress but this makes it more challenging - sometimes turns me into an Angry Bird when I get to the 9th or 10th try but that's part of the game's fun.

author: Rob
title: Wish I had read the reviews
content: An absolute rip off to get a fraction of the game for $3 without telling you upfront.  Then you have to buy in-game purchases to advance.  Plus, they do this since kids will buy the in-game stuff and the parents get an unexpected bill.  This is an absolute scam and this will be the last Angry Birds game we ever buy.

author: S. Kutner
title: Secret Extra Charges required to finish game
content: I didn't appreciate getting half way through the game, and being asked for more money to complete it! When you pay for something that should be it!

author: SurgicalHalo5
title: Best Angry Bird game I have tried
content: This version of Angry Birds works and is enjoyable. I finally found a game from Roxio that was worth the money.

author: JULIE C
title: This game is so Awesome
content: I love this game, I am a Star Wars fan, from seeing it as a kid, to being super excited for the next installment which I know Disney will do it justice, to say the least. Anyway I love the characters in this game and how their abilities mirror the movie.

author: Cgnat
title: great fun
content: As fun as the original. Some of the additional birds aren't quite as entertaining, but this one is top notch.

author: Patrick
title: I LOVE IT!!
content: when I saw this app I got it. It!  has shuch good sownd efecs .I love It I'm. gust happy It happen.

author: Calob Jones
title: good game with some aweful problems

author: Kindle Customer
title: hard to play
content: Not worth the effort.

author: Kitty
title: I love it!!
content: So much fun!!!!! All of my grandkids love to play!  We can spend 2 or 3 hours in competition with each other, great family fun! 2 thumbs up!!!

author: tashan stone
title: AWESOME!
content: my daughter and my husband have both downloaded this game to their tablets and challenge eachother to see who is better or who has gotten farther - it's definitely entertaining! :)

author: Smiles1021
title: booo too much money
content: do not by this add.if I hate it you'll hate it.please do not buy no mater what anyone says about it.

author: Samuel B. White
title: More than I Expected
content: It's Angry Birds with an homage to Star Wars.  I wasn't expecting much, but it turned out to be a lot of fun.  I especially like the levels where you have to deal with gravity wells around planets.  I wish more levels came with the initial purchase, but considering I got it for 99 cents--and Rovio's got to make their money somewhere--I don't mind too much.

author: Linda Holmes
title: Cool!
content: Love it!  The force fields that wipe out the pigs, light saber chops and the missile shots!  Even when you lose a level, it's Dark Vader that mocks you!!  Fun, I went all the way through, now I am back to all the levels I did not get 3 stars on!!

author: Bill Markley Jr
title: Use the Force Luke
content: Great meshing of my favorite movie saga and Angry Birds I play it everyday hoping to crush the piggies into pieces of bacon!

author: Cody
title: A pretty cool game.
content: I think Angry Birds Star Wars is pretty good.  I like destroying pigs.  My favorite part is when I pass a level.  I also like the birds' new Star Wars outfits.  So if you like Angry Birds and Star Wars, you will like this.

author: Donny Shumaker
title: Fun but not finished AND they want more money.
content: Once again they release a game that isn't finished. More "coming soon" levels like in Space. And if you want to play the Dagoba levels you either have to 3 star every level (means not completing any levels with the Falcon) or you have to pay another $1.99.

author: Kurt
title: so addicting
content: so great and fun that if the update doesn't come out ill start a war a star war lol troll fail

author: Anonymous
title: Awesome
content: This game combines the two best ideas ever. Star Wars and Angry Birds. I love it. The gameplay is a lot like the other games but the powers are different. So far the best Angry Birds game ever.

author: red
title: Star Wars Angry Birds
content: We, our family, just love this great game.  Everyone plays it in our family and it is just so much fun.We have three generations playing and having so much fun.  To be able to share this game and have so much fun together makes us recommend this for any family.  Great game, great fun.Everyone should really enjoy.  Even the grandparents are enjoying.

author: Caleb Purdie
title: DAZZLING
content: I actually thoroughly enjoyed the game more than I thought I would. It has plenty of cool Star Wars characters that have cool abilities. The levels were also consistently difficult which made it enjoyable. The only problem I had was that the two bonus stages cost money to access. I do however like how they give you free powerups regularly. Overall it was an amazing game. Great for kindle fire! Hope this review helped!

author: Still wait for order for over a month!
title: Rovio, u make awesome games
content: I'm not surprised that George Lucas let u make this. The old man wouldn't even care about it. The new features and stuff are cool but it will need more levels  and worlds from the movies. Here's a suggestion that might help you get more 5-star ratings for this game: this time, make a Imperial Star Destroyer-themed world, with new features and birds.

author: Christine Glass
title: A nice change of pace
content: While this has all the characteristics of the original it does change it up. The boards are different and fun. The fact that you can use a light saber in flight is awesome!

author: jan
title: One Star
content: not what I wanted

author: BeccksFamily
title: LOVE IT!!
content: Love angry birds and so do all of my kids and my Hubby.  Had the free version on my phone when I got my Kindle immediately paid for the full version, never disappoints so nice not to have the ads popping up.  I did also but the Path of the Jedi which I think was $1.99 or something.  But everyone in our family of 6 enjoys it well worth the $$!!

author: IUSE
title: Five Stars
content: Fun and humorous

author: Julie Angorn
title: Awesome
content: WOW. I love this game. The graphics, the characters, I love it. I also really like how you turned the all loved Mighty Eagle into the Millennium Falcon.. Worth the money.

author: jgc
title: good
content: Good game

author: Nickolaus Gonzales
title: Five Stars
content: the game is great!

author: yenma

Highly recommed this game

author: Debra d

content: My grandson loves it. He's  four years old, keeps him entertained for quite some time. So it works well for me.

content: my  grandchildren really enjoy this series. it is a bit more exciting , even older children enjoy. My  grandchildren have taught  me to enjou all angry birds

author: UNM_Surgery_CFH

content: Always fun to play

author: Glenn German

content: the only thing I don't like about this app is doesn't. have the new update. of angry birds star wars there's new levels on the both _you can defeat the mynoc pigs

author: Bill Madia
title: A fun game! A bit aggravating at times
content: A fun game! A bit aggravating at times, but what game isn't? It's also a funny riff on the Star Wars saga.

author: big daddy
title: The force is strong with this one
content: Move over Luke skywalker because the force is strong with this one. If you haven't played this game then you have not lived. This action packed game has all your favoret star wars charitors in the forms of your favorit birds. So may the force be with you.

author: harris
title: It is ok

author: Shine
title: Star Wars Angry Birds
content: It's ok, not anything to brag about!I liked the first one and Seasons better.  Stop asking for more words when it is not necessay!

author: Jack M Spencer
title: When are you going to update???
content: What's going on Amazon??? The free version on google play has already updated the Hoth levels weeks ago. Why not you!?!?

author: gdhelton
title: May the force be with you.
content: Star Wars merged with Angry Birds... What could be better than that. The graphics are awesome, the sound quality is cool, the abilities of the different birds mirror the abilities of the film fairly well. PLUS you have an angry bird with a light saber.

author: Cipaczihuatl
title: What a game
content: The game is pure fun, my 5 year old and I are addicted to it, and of course, we're big fans of the Star War series. My reason for giving it 4 stars is because it took 3 whole days to download, it reminded me of the old days when I got my first computer, in the early 90's, and everything took forever to be ready.

author: Randall Y Ketcham
title: Was a great app
content: Doesn't work properly after the recent update. Shuts down constantly. I'm really not trying to re-install this after having not only paid for it, but also how much I have accomplished already.

author: David Quiles
title: Four Stars
content: Fun game to play on a bus or something.

author: Alice
title: Lots of fun
content: My 5 year old  Great Grandson will sit for Hours and play this game. The only thing he wants to go to the next level and I will not pay for it.So if they are happy with the first level it is ok.

author: hi
title: stop. read this.
content: easily the best app I ever bought by far. the levels are really fun and challenging but the best part is the new update where you can play as darth vader.  my only complaint is that I would like to see more action as vader. you can only play as vader for about two seconds in the whole game.

author: L. Moreno
title: Angry Birds Star Wars
content: This is a very fun game.  I played other AB games and this one is my favorite of all.

author: Mike B
title: Angry Birds STAR WARS
content: The new birds and their different powers are just he reboot this game needed.  Light sabers, force powers and blasters are just a few of the surprises you'll discover

author: br549
title: Much better than 'space'
content: I love the Angry Birds Star Wars!  I did not really care for AB Space but this is one I really enjoy playing.  I am not an expert on the Graphics, if I can see it and it appeals to me then it is great.  Just know I have had as much fun with this addition as I did with Angry Birds and AB Rio and Seasons.

author: Jonathan
title: Uggh
content: I think that it's really stupid that I paid $2.99 for this game and all of a sudden, all of these stinking ads come in. I'm not wasting a PENNY on Rovio until they stop ripping me off!!!!!

author: kirbyfan1100
title: new update
content: when I got the new update yesterday,it had this moon thing now,there's a another update today and it deleted the world! this is the only problem I'm having.other than that its a fun game :)

author: Jenna Jensen
title: May the birds be with you...
content: Rovio really outdid themselves on this game! The graphics are amazing, with a clever relation to the sequence the movies followed. Every Angry Birds and Star Wars fan should experience the pleasure in which I received from this game!

author: suddi
title: Cool
content: Glad you have new games. I'd love some explanations and hints. But, it's great. I'd like to find out how I can download the PAID for one on my new Samsung tablet.

author: calvin j jamison
title: Angry birds star wars
content: Lightsaber.....check

author: Archangel
title: Good mindless fun...
content: I bought this so my grandkids would have something to play on my Kindle during a holiday road trip. Unfortunately I ended up playing it more than they did. Don't buy this game if you don't want to get sucked into the Angry Birds vortex...

author: Becky Fiorillo
title: rovio is epic
content: All of there ideas are awesome like angry birds star wars. But wish it was free because now I only have two coins and I spent half of them on this awesome game but still it's really cool.

author: Kieran Malaqai Lee Gilliam
title: Luke your father is a pig
content: I really loved the idea when it first came out. I was not really into the first angry birds or the sub stories that were made after(seasons ETC). However this is the perfect match for somebody that loves the movies and story plus the pleasure of popping pigs with birds, though that makes very little sense.

author: William R. Havens
title: it is angry birds made to be starwars
content: Well I do not find the paid game any better than the free game, other than having ads and such. Are the ads really that bad... no. Look if you like angry birds you might like this one, if you like star wars then you might like this one, but if you like angry birds and star wars then you will like this one. It really is not as clever as family guy's star wars remakes but it passes the time.

author: K-Lynn
title: Way too much fun!
content: I love this game!  It's all the fun of the other Angry  Birds games with a Sci-Fi twist. You gotta try this.

author: Carol K. Lucas
title: GREAT GAME
content: I have NEVER played any games on a computer or on my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9 but that has recently changed.

author: gigglebutt
title: Best bird-flinging game yet!
content: This game is amazing. It has a good retelling of Starwars. It also has a great amount of levels and gameplay. BEST THREE DOLLARS EVER!

author: kookaburra
title: yeah this is awesome
content: my four year old son is rating this.  It has several different levels and 15-20 sub levels in each level, so plenty of entertainment. My son likes being red skywalker(luke) and chubacca.  He is able to operate the whole game on his own and able to complete many levels.  He loves the star wars music too!

author: Monica Mangreum
title: 5 Stars
content: As you already know this game is an all time favorite. I never get bored playing tho there are times Rovio will  pull a fast one and repeat levels already played. If you got to repeat change the characters or new scenery

author: great game I love it
title: two favorites combined!
content: this is my favorite app but some of the levels are too hard and the millennium falcon does nothing I've only beat one level using it. make it easier and Ya got 5 stars. love the character abilities.

author: Anonymous
title: 2 negatives
content: Like many users, I don't like paying for extra levels when I already paid for the game.  Also, the game stopped working (wouldn't even open), and my only choice was to uninstall and re-install. The good news: the extra level I paid for was still available.  The really bad news: I had to start over completely as all my progress was eliminated when I uninstalled it.

author: liz
title: Disappointing
content: I bought this game since it was specific to the Kindle. I was expecting it to work. We have 3 stars on every level but it no longer lets us progress in the game. There are little videos you watch and then it should unlock the new level but this is not happening. So we are stuck with only a few playable levels and are very disappointed.

author: J Ruppert
title: a fun app but a waste of money
content: Great game but i really think it is too expensive. $3.00 for 3 levels seems like a little much. Also, for another $2.00 you can get one more level(Path of the Jedi). Unless you can manage to geg 3 star in every single level the you must pay for Path of the Jedi. Like i said very fun game but too expensive for the gameplay

author: billie jane carstedt
title: angry birds star wars.
content: all I can say is love love love love love love and I would like more levels to play soon..

author: angry bird
title: It's Angry Birds!!!
content: Bought for my granddaughter - she thinks it is the greatest - that means it is a winner in my book

author: Music Lover
title: YES! Great Nerd fun!
content: Super fun if you like Star Wars and Angry Birds!

author: James Seiters
title: Entertaining
content: Game plays very good on kindle fire HD. Levels are fun and challenging, even fun when played a second time.

author: Tim
title: Excellent Graphics
content: This is agreat version of the classic game. The graphics are incredible and the game is fun. Even us older folks enjoy a great game.

author: jamesgirl
title: I have so much fun with this game.
content: I love this game.....it is addictive in a fun way.

author: Sandra Burchsted
title: Charged $2.99. When was told it was on sale for. 99.
content: I feel ripped off.  Would not have purchased the game if I knew I was being charged 2.99 instead of the advertised. 99

author: Jorge A Rodriguez
title: Nonsense
content: A 3dollar game and it has two levels? AND you want us to buy the third level for almost the same amount of money? ROVIO  knows better than this.

author: J. Hayden
title: Bought it for my 5 year old grandson
content: My grandson spends the night some times and I bought it for him because he is Angry Birds crazy. He plays it so I am forced to play sometimes with him...I don't care for Angry Birds but he likes it, he is 5 so I guess he likes it ok.  Hoping he will out grow liking it, I think the whole think is lame.

author: Gracean Hope
title: Frustrating Love/Hate relationship
content: I enjoy the game when it works.  I find that the play area on the screen will move from right to left and increase in size, whether I'm touching the screen or not.  Although I really enjoy the game when it stays in place, it can be VERY frustrating when it decides to jump around and causes misfires.  Not sure if it's the game or my Kindly Fire HD that has the glitch.

author: mrsrhs
title: Best Yet
content: I have always loved Angry Birds, but the Starwars version is the BEST. It's definitely worth getting the paid version. I am an addict!

author: Amazon Customer
title: ... son has autism and he says this is his favorite Angry Birds game
content: My son has autism and he says this is his favorite Angry Birds game. He has about 15 different AB games and this one has been non-stop since we purchased it last week.

author: flashgod130
title: would not download
content: I have tried multiple times to download angry birds star wars on my kindle fire with no success. I've heard it a great game but after paying for it, I would like to fond this out for myself.

author: Heatherthediva
title: A must have
content: We received this game free, and I must say it is an amazing game.  A little more difficult than regular angry birds, as an adult I just passed the Death Star level (second world).  The music is awesome, video quality stunning, and a must have on your list of Kindle Fire HD freebies.

author: Chris
title: RIP OFF
content: Spent $2.99 for this app last night.  My son is done with it the next day and gets to another level and says you have to pay $1.99 more to play it?  That is very misleading.  When you buy the app it should be the entire game.  I've paid .99 for apps on other devices and got more content than that.  For $3 you really should get more than an hour of play time. This is ridiculous.  That is the last time I actually pay for an angry birds app.  My son can get it if it is free other than that forget it he can find another game that isn't a rip off!!!

author: R.Hilton
title: Happy....
content: people are saying u have to buy the Jeri levels? well get 3 stars on all levels and it unlocks!!! if u cant get 3 stars on all levels then ur not a true angry bird fan!! just saying..

author: Better than iPad
title: Surprise Another Downloading Issue With Kindle Fire!
content: My kindle fire has attempted to download the updated version today (says there are new permissions too) and will not download.  Why must we wait to install the updated versions (correctly) while every other platform has the option without any issues.  Amazon get your stuff together.  And this is not just this app (Plants Vs. Zombies 2 (we still have to wait), Simpsons, we had to wait a long time).

author: Justin Edward Frye
title: app is broken and does not work properly
content: This game is nice but the app crashes. My son and I can only play 4 levels of the entire game, and for $2.99, that doesnt seem fair at all. Right after you complete level 4, you are supposed to see a video, then continue onto level 5. That does not happen though, the screen goes black, and a few seconds later, it takes me back to the home screen. I want a refund of my $2.99, which is a lot of money for such a simple and broken app.

author: Nicholas Junkerman
title: where are the final level
content: I buy the game and it`s fun and addictive. Then I have to pay for more levels. now its been since xmas 2012 and the last levels havent even been released in an already short game.

author: James Klahr
title: Angry Birds Star Wars
content: I purchased Angry Birds Star Wars for my boys and it hasn't disappointed.  They want to play it all the time and they get so excited when they unlock a level.  It is a lot of fun and very addictive.

author: Jason MacK
title: Angry Birds Star Wars!
content: Just when you thought they couldn't do anything else, in comes Angry Birds Star Wars. Same formula as the others, with new powered birds that resemble our favorite Star Wars characters. This is by far the best AB game yet. Well worth the purchase price for the Fire.

author: Donald Fiddes
title: Nice twist
content: This is angry birds for adults or math geeks. The trajectories needed are difficult and challenging. NOT something you can take lightly when you get into the death star series.

author: John H.
title: BEWARE! In app purchases
content: I let my 6yo son play this on my Kindle and then one day I notice that I have a $1.99 and $9.99 purchase on my Amazon account. He bought something called Mighty Falcon Small Bundle and Mighty Falcon Large Bundle. I looked around on the app and found there is even a 19.99 bundle that you can buy. It just takes 2 clicks to make the purchase, no password required. I had no idea they added in app purchases on this one. This will probably be the last Rovio purchase that I make.

author: pete0714
title: please, fix this broken game that we paid 3 dollars for.
content: I am a patient man, and I love this game, but without support on a paid game like this, I feel that it is unworthy of a good rating.  This is unacceptable, and needs to be remedied right away.

title: best game ever
content: I love this game even that I had to buy it. it was a great deal.there is a lot of action. I love it.

author: DM
title: Good game - Too bad I bought it on Amazon
content: Having just bought an Asus TF700, I discovered I bought A LOT of Kindle Fire games that I now can't use since they're only compatible with the KF.  SOOOO, I have to buy them again on Google Play.  Game is fun in and of itself, but I will no longer buy Amazon games; my jailbroke KF like Google Play games just fine.

author: Jim and Pat
title: It's stupid
content: It's stupid that these angry bird games don't give you the rules on how to play them. It gets very tiring to have to learn them out of the frustration of losing and on a trial and error basis. I most especially hate bad piggies beacuse of the lack of help

author: Llih
title: fine
content: It is what it is.

author: shane
title: This will be the last Rovio game i buy.
content: Bought this game for my 7 year old. The game keeps asking for more money. Rovio, spend the $3 well becouse it will be the last you ever get from me.

author: Patrick Ford
title: A lot of fun
content: Love the graphics and the star wars theme. The animation is great. Playing this on the kindle makes it even more fun.

author: doglover202
title: What a ripoff!!!
content: The levels are great, but Dagobah and Hoth are  real ripoffs, especially Dagobah. Just to get more levels, you have to pay $2.00. I am a huge Star Wars fan, and this was a complete disappointment. My six year old brother is addicted to it though.... :-)

author: Sama80
title: Freaking Awesome
content: I am adicted to Angry Birds and this new chapter is beyond great. It's challenging enough so that you do have to work out rhe destruction. The new character concepts are so interesting. Love using the force with the black bird. Can't wait to find Vader.

author: RockOn
title: Good fun
content: Great game, challenging, and fun to play.  This takes traditional Angry Birds to a new level with the force fields etc...  The Charcters are funny and fun to learn.  Overall enjoyable and a nice game to play even if you only have a few minutes.

author: mom who loves to read
title: My son plays everyday!
content: My son is 6 and plays Angry birds star wars everyday. We have not had any trouble with the app. Though I did  figure out quickly how the parent controls worked after he ordered some new ships. I have this app for my kindle fire and Samsung galaxy 3.

author: Lori Dingman
title: Star Wars Angry Birds
content: I had never played the the game Angry Birds before so I downloaded the free app. I enjoyed it so much I told my son and he suggested this version. I purchased it and have had a great time playing it. The graphics are great on my Kindle Fire HD.

author: RyanDMan
title: Welcome to the future of another sequel!!
content: Cool game and been loving these Angry Birds series . Each series has unique distinguishing attributes and new and almost similar features, like powered birds and the cursor when launching the birds, which really helps a lot! Humorous gameplay between these brave, suicidal birds and keep up the good work!

author: janie
title: Hd starwars
content: Fun but very annoying! The scoring seem to be out of whack, when I get the score for the stars, the next time I play the same game, I'll get 2000 Moe points and it won't advance to all 3 stars.

author: Dianne McKenzie
title: Five Stars
content: a fun take on an old game.

author: Johnnygogo
title: Goonie About the Birds
content: Anything that can capture my attention like these birds and pigs and make time disappear is wonderful.  My hat is off to the Finnish gents who created this entertaining app.  Try it, you may regret it if your time is more valuable than "getting those pigs"!  Especially in a Star Wars environment.

author: Alice F
title: Birds in outer space
content: The basic idea is the same, dressed up in space symbols. Birds smash into objects and destroy aliens. There are some interesting variations on strategy...some missals are fired backward so it is necessary to aim the birds away from the target. It is hard to determine what many of the menu icons are for.

title: best one in the franchise
content: I personally think this is the best one in the franchise because it has more creative levels. The abilities and costumes of the birds are awesome and each star wars character chosen for the birds are perfect, I  have played and owned every other
